text: Na ukkhittakāya antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na ukkhittakāya antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 9. I will not go with robes hitched up in inhabited areas: a training to be observed.
๙. พึงทำศึกษาว่า”เราจักไม่ไปในละแวกบ้านด้วยทั้งเวิกผ้า”
9. I shall not go (with robes) hitched up in inhabited areas: this is a training to be done.
